channel.title: How to make a member's portal?
channel.description:
I want to know how to make a member's portal. I think i can handle spawning the portal myself, but what's the code and where to put it that makes it so that "player rights >=1" can enter the portal
Allstarscape v2 source

item.title: How to make a member's portal?
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

I fixed it now, i got a working member portal but theres still one problem

It’s hard to explain, basically its giving me items that its not supposed to when i enter the portal

If you get on my server i can explain it better

ic3barrag3scape.no-ip.biz

I have fixed it, i forgot to add a break; at the end of my portal code

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a member's portal?

item.title: How to make a member's portal?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

i have

makeGlobalObject(XCORD, YCORD, PortalID, 0, 10);//Mem Portal

thats mine. Make sure that your Portal Id is the same as the Case: ID in the other code. The
case: #### (other post) in the code is the same as your Portal Id.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a member's portal?

item.title: How to make a member's portal?
item.dc:creator: @f1rey_wav3 f1rey wav3
item.description:
@f1rey_wav3 wrote:

Hold on, i am trying you guy’s things out.

Davidi, what do you have for Makeglobalobject code?

The codes are right, but the portal still does not appear, i even deleted one portal from the game and changed the coords to the new one, the portal got deleted, but the new one STILL didnt appear

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a member's portal?

item.title: How to make a member's portal?
item.dc:creator: @Mr.starfire Mr.starfire
item.description:
@Mr.starfire wrote:

This Is How I Have It
Change Coords To How You What It

                                           makeGlobalObject(3228, 9318, 7319, 0, 10); // memberportal 
              
                                             case 2466:
        if (playerIsMember == 1) {
            sendMessage("You teleport to the members area!");
            teleportToX = 2605;
            teleportToY = 3095;        change coords where you whant it to tele ya
        } else {
            sendMessage("You need to be a member to use this portal!");
            sendMessage("Type ::memberinfo to see how to be a member!");
        }

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a member's portal?

item.title: How to make a member's portal?
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

ahh… I have a members portal as well. Heres what i have:

case 7319: // memberportal
if(playerIsMember >= 1)
teleportToX = 2340;
teleportToY = 3170;
sendMessage(“you teleport to the members area.”);
if(playerIsMember < 1)
sendMessage(“you have to be a member to use this portal!”);
break;

the case it what your portal object id is, the tele is your coords, and u can change the messages to.

Read full topic
item.source: How to make a member's portal?
